website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a high-quality organic maca powder, although the taste may be a turnoff for some.
pros: High quality at a great price
High in protein, fiber, and vitamins and minerals
cons: This option causes digestive pain for some buyers, while others had issues with the flavor

customer_reviews.title: 32 ounce package only weighed 1.5 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: We use this product every day, but I will start weighing my packages from now on. Out of curiosity, I decided to weigh the unopened 32 oz. package and it was considerably short.
customer_reviews.author: David Marusa

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a kid again!
customer_reviews.text: Solid price. Amazing medicine. I take a tsp in the morning w a lil coconut oil, cacao,in green tea. I feel so good, tons of energy and very good feelings throughout the body...everything is joy, working is more fun, maca will make your sex go thru the roof! This got me out of a funk where i was just laying around,moping. Now i am excited to live, to actually get out and do,create. Get this , you will not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Beykirch

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Product was poorly packaged resulting in the bag popping and getting powder everywhere. Upon second inspection noticed that the expiration date was scraped/crossed out. I am not comfortable eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: This product has a great taste and definitely gives you some nice get up ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to read anything negative about maca in general. This product has a great taste and definitely gives you some nice get up and go. I combine it with fruits for early a.m. along with fresh ground flax, noni and fresh coconut. What little I go out and shoot up the town on a Saturday night I might make a maca concoction for my sweetie and I and at 60 and 66 we will out dance any of the 25 years old hands down.
customer_reviews.author: just sayin

customer_reviews.title: MAY CAUSE CANCER LABEL
customer_reviews.text: Received it in the mail today, and saw a lovely sign that states that the product may contain lead and Cadmium ( a type of metal found in batteries, paint and plastics) known to cause cancer, birth defects and other reproductive harms" This little sticker was nowhere to be found in the advertising pictures they posted. I purposely looked at all the pictures on the ad and they do not show this sign anywhere. I would NOT reccomend you buy this product AT ALLL (AT LEAST NOT THIS BRAND).
customer_reviews.author: Velsabet M.

customer_reviews.title: Product was different this time.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Macs for years and thus brand for most of that time. I have always been happy with the product until this last order. The maca this time was much darker then usual and had a very strong, fowl smell and taste. My hope is that there has not been a change in production because I will have to buy a different brand. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: De-Vo

customer_reviews.title: I mix it into my smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I mix it into my morning smoothie; it helps me keep feeling full until the afternoon. I've heard that Maca has great health benefits; its been recommended in my health community and so far, I like it a lot. I wouldn't eat it alone, I tried that once. I eased my way into it, with a teaspoon a day. After 3 weeks I am now taking one tablespoon a day.
customer_reviews.author: LizaJane

customer_reviews.title: Maca is one of my favorite health products
customer_reviews.text: Maca is one of my favorite health products. I have been buying this brand for several years and, the only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the price has nearly doubled since I first began purchasing it. Great product, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible, and expires in 2 months. How can someone use 2 lbs of maca in 2 months???
customer_reviews.author: Tealyn

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 bags in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I adore the maca powder for its great energy boost and nice taste compared to other superfoods powders I'll consume. My regular serving of this is 1-2 tbsp in a smoothie or added to my fermented kombucha oatmeal. I have made a few kombucha brews using this and it creates a strong carbonation so be cautious if planned to brew in booch.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb RagnarTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Maca for several years now and have gone through several brands. This one is among the best I've tried and at a fantastic price. I love the taste and usually sprinkle it (generously) over my salads, roasted veggies, eggs... it's even fab with dark chocolate! About 1Tbsp/day does the trick for me. Since starting Maca, it has done wonders for my hormonal balance; totally normalized my cycle and has prevented any hot flashes. Will definitely keep on purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: indigo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, foul taste, I've tried for over a week to find something to mix it with to be breathable and I just can't. I've tried others before and they weren't nearly this bad... It over powers anything it is mixed with and tastes horrible Waste of $20... I bought this only for the price as it was the best deal I found, you get what you pay for... After reading other reviews, will be checking my expiration date...
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Toxic Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed upon reading the WARNING about chemicals within the product such as lead and cadmium that are known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm. I would NOT have bought this product, I am not going to use it, and now it can't be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to my taste, but it’s good quality maca
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I think this literally tastes like actual dirt/dust and I couldn’t palate it...but my partner REALLY likes it and adds it to smoothies frequently (which does help hide the taste). It is difficult to manually stir into liquids, but the blender takes care of it just fine. It lasted a long time, didn’t clump together, and didn’t seem to decrease in quality over time. A pound takes quite a while to go through! I probably will be buying it again for my partner, so if you like maca I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BNM

customer_reviews.title: I bought the product to help with my overall lifestyle ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product to help with my overall lifestyle change. The product did cause any problems the first few weeks so I continued my daily intake. After the first month I began feeling severe stomach pain. I finally narrowed it down to the maca powder. I suggest you consult a physician prior to purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: received exactly what I ordered.! (Rare these days!!)
customer_reviews.text: I use it as nutritional supplement. and honestly I was blown away in a GOOD way, as several things I have ordered recently were not as advertised. i.e.: bait and switch or much smaller package than advertised. these were exactly what I ordered, at a very fair price, and even arrived almost halfway across country as I recall....in only 2 or 3 days. was shocked. !! I highly recommend and will be a definite repeat customer. Quality appears to be Excellent ( I am new to this product, and have only tried 4 brands I think, this has been the BEST)
customer_reviews.author: Al MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works well! (But tastes like armpit sweat!)
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm not sure what armpit sweat tastes like (salty I'm guessing) but this Maca Power really works well but its like eating sawdust. I could barely stomach it and I've got a tough stomach! But because it made Junior really pop-up and stay strong so well that I bought empty capsules and capsule filling device ($30 on Amazon) so I could swallow this stuff. Now all is well! btw... this stuff is like a weak Viagra but could probably double the dose and get even closer to Viagra.
customer_reviews.author: RichD

customer_reviews.title: The  taste  is  AWFUL  AND  UNBEARABLE  TO  DRINK
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the item is Organic but The taste is AWFUL AND FOR MYSELF COULD NOT DIGEST THE MACA DUE TO THE AFTERTASTE IN MY STOMACH. GOING TO CHECK IF THEY MIGHT HAVE IT IN PILLS BUT THEY HAVE TO IMPROVE ON THE CONTENTS OF THE ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: G. chinn

customer_reviews.title: Great in Oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: I just add about half a teaspoon to my oatmeal recipes.. It makes the oatmeal taste creamier and smoother. It kind of taste like vanilla to me. It's also good in smoothies . You don't need to use much because a little goes a long way. So this bag will probably last me six months at least. I eat oatmeal almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Powder
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. This maca doesn't have as strong as a taste as other comparable powders (Trader Joe's Maca). I prefer the less strong taste but that comes down to preference. Gelantinized versions are easier to absorb for the body so this version of the powder is perfect for that. The bag is easily storable and not too big or clumsy. Also, the bag is durable and doesn't seem inclined to rip or develop holes.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated my hot flashes!
customer_reviews.text: I was having night sweats terribly, gross, I know. But I read about Maca and thought I would give it a try. I started out with a tablespoon and then backed off to a teaspoon. I take one rounded teaspoon every day and haven't had a hot flash or night sweats since the first couple of weeks. I am convinced!!
customer_reviews.author: Caralucy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Im unfair
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars...maybe I am unfair. I could have given it 1 star or 5 stars. I just cannot tell a discernible difference. The taste is.........terrible. I am not a picky eater whatsoever and I am willing to try anything, but wow, this stuff is hard to get down on its own. It even overpowers a protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maca powder not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the benefits of taking maca powder since it instantly made me want to vomit. I even cut the serving down to a quarter scoop in my green shake and still got nauseous. Probably a great product but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, I like it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this product is supposed to taste like but it wasn't bad. I used about a tablespoon, mixed it with water, smelled a little interesting. Tasted like a pea mixed with a rich nuttier flavor. It's a RAW organic HEALTH food. It's not going to taste like cupcakes so I really don't know why this product received all the taste complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Best MACA out there.
customer_reviews.text: Best MACA out there. I have tried other brands and they're nothing compared to this one. May cause stomach cramps if used in the raw form. I throw a spoon full in my super hot morning coffee. Also you might want to cycle this product to prevent your body from getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I mix with coffee, flax seed meal, chia ...
customer_reviews.text: I mix with coffee, flax seed meal, chia seeds and coconut milk in a blender to make a morning smoothie-type drink. The maca powder is supposed to provide energy. I have been using the morning drink for along time now and it helps me start my day.
customer_reviews.author: mppatton

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!! SEVERE STOMACH PAIN
customer_reviews.text: This raw maca powder had me doubled over in pain. Then it came out like rocket fire flames! You've been warned... get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R. Helton

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste or smell good...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is my second order of maca root. The first brand I got was the Now brand which smells like butterscotch. I was looking for bulk because it’s cheaper. This stuff smells and tastes terrible. I’m going to power through it, disguising it with cinnamon. But I don’t believe I’ll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, good quality, excellent flavor.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the earthy, nutty, butterscotch-like taste of maca powder, adding it to oatmeal and other treats can help you squeeze in extra vitamins and minerals. The root is low in calories, but contains a lot of vitamin C, iron, potassium, and copper.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Tastes moldy
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying your product for a while, but this most recent bag tastes very funky and moldy. Unfortunately, there is not an option to request a replacement or to return the item. I am very unhappy about this.
customer_reviews.author: BJAllstate

customer_reviews.title: Great powder, put it in your smoothies every day!
customer_reviews.text: Purity is good, the powder has a sweet smell, and taste. It makes my smoothies taste better and acts almost as a sweetner to make them taste good no matter how much Kale I put into it. ;) The amount vs. price is about the best out there and you only need one tsp. I like this and use it every day. It definitely gives me great energy and its a mistake to take it at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Old product
customer_reviews.text: Product seems really old... not like all the other times I’ve bought it. It has an odd flavor and came all crumbled in clumps. Not happy with this and will start buying from another seller
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flavor and easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: I put a half-teaspoon full in my coffee every morning. I love the slightly sweet & nutty flavor. This particular brand mixes well. (I haven't had as much success with other brands.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Can not return unopened
customer_reviews.text: Dont not buy if you are not sure! You can not return it. Even if it is unopened you can not return!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Not too happy!

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite powdered Maca brand to date.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands of powdered maca over the years and to date this is my favorite brand. Priced right, taste is pleasant and product is quality. I put a teaspoon in my morning coffee and I am good for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, reliable company
customer_reviews.text: Who can love maca! Yes, we all can. This actually tastes great and I use it in some way daily, either in my smoothies, just mixed in water....
customer_reviews.author: Cherry LaDee

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a quality company
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the raw maca over the gelatinized (of another brand). It brings a nice, slightly sweet flavor to my smoothies. I don't have any digestive problems because I already eat tons of fiber so my body is used to it. I'm using it to balance my hormones and so far so good that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Richcreek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for pre workout without all the crap of other preworkouts. Increases libido, so that's pretty super duper
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Never Disappointed with Healthworks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this many times from Healthworks. Always consistently great quality. Thankfully cost of maca has stabilized and gone back down to reasonable prices. High recommendation to purchase this product, especially from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Gnemik

customer_reviews.title: Vile, vile flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different supplements and this is one that I couldn't choke down -- can't hide successfully in something, can't take it by itself. I eventually threw it in my garden. AWFUL stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and price
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few brands of Maca Powder and for the price and convenience, Healthworks is a reliable source. I add it to my smoothies to give them a richer flavor and I've been happy with the consistency their maca powder gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on bag doesn't line up correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the thickness of the plastic bag and the Maca powder in the bag. I took off one star because the zipper on the bag doesn't work. I have to put a clip on the bag. I am a fulltime traveler. Zippers on bags is a must.
customer_reviews.author: gail sterling

customer_reviews.title: warning
customer_reviews.text: so i want to California where there disclosure laws are stricter and found out this product has lead in it buy from another manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: zz

customer_reviews.title: Expose to chemicals including lead !
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, this product states it is ORGANIC, but on the back side of the package there is a label stating: WARNING: This product can expose yo to chemicals including lead, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer or birth defects of other reproductive harm. AND, YOU CANNOT RETURN THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with hole in bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a short while back and put it in my cupboard. What I didnt notice is that there was a tiny hole in the bottom of the bag. When I set out on my counter it sprayed through the hole. I would like to return this, but I can't. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Susan D Tate

customer_reviews.title: I've not much of a fan for the "malt" smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I've not much of a fan for the "malt" smell and taste. But, I use this in my smoothie, everyday. It helps regulate my female hormones.
customer_reviews.author: WantFeetInThe Sand_75

customer_reviews.title: Maca Powder Peruvian Raw Organic
customer_reviews.text: Blends well with my protein and food supps. Good stuff. My second order. Taste is like sweet potato and ginseng, pleasant, but unique. Works well with Ginseng.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maca is amazing for....
customer_reviews.text: Maca is amazing for balancing hormones in men and women. Just don't use it everyday because the body will get used to it and it won't work anymore. Also try Colloidal Silver from www.CSHstore.com ....great people and prices there!
customer_reviews.author: Jack12

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple times. It is a pretty big bag and I keep it in my freezer. I actually never finished a bag and tend to change it out after a year. I probably don't need two pounds. The quality of the product seems pretty good. Maca seems to give me pretty good energy. It might be a bit tough on weak stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Giorgetti

customer_reviews.title: I take this after breakfast before going to work.  I clean houses for sale living
customer_reviews.text: I buy 3 bags at a time. I started taking this 7 years ago. I have the energy of an ox
customer_reviews.author: Luz Marisol Troche

customer_reviews.title: Mental Clarity!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since Winter and drink it everyday in a green drink (pineapple juice, coconut water, filtered water, maca powder and wheatgrass powder) which I put in my blender or shake up in a glass bottle. I have found it makes me feel clearer headed and have much more stamina for working out. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: modern7

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I order as needed and my house is never out of it
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Value for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Maca is a great product for energy in a natural way. Before I purchased at Trader Joe's, however they are no longer selling this product, so I went with this order. Great size for the buck, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Light taste
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has the better price for this size bag of Maca Powder. This can easily be added to a smoothie/shake and can hide the taste of the Maca if it's too much for you.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor and price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality organic maca which is typically very expensive. This is the best price I have seen even compared to non organic. We have barley made a dent in the maca and still is just as fresh as first purchased being kept in an air tight container in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: ca.roybal

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if all Maca powder is bitter or just ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if all Maca powder is bitter or just this one but I had to stop adding to my smoothies. It really gave a bitter taste to them no matter what fruits and vegetables I used.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Finally. Something that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Maca yesterday and today in my morning cup of coffee. I had to travel all day yesterday and felt amazing. Used it again today and feel great! No weird jittery energy- just more alert and focused. I really like it so far. I do have chronic fatigue (which is why I bought it-and hypothyroidism) and this definitely gives me a boost of energy that lasts. I’m excited to see long term effects of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Good value for money compared to in-store prices.
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: Bought several times
customer_reviews.text: Used this for several years and happy with product assisting my workouts
customer_reviews.author: Beth Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, 2nd bag from this company. Glad they offer the 2 lb bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: Great for baking. I can't use it raw without digestive problems, but I've found it's perfect for adding to brownie, muffin, pancake recipes etc. Most excellent company, that Healthworks; I never hesitate to buy their products.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVEABLE!!!!  WARNING THIS PRODUCT HAS A LABEL THAT IT MAY CONTAIN LEAD AND OTHER CHEMICALS
customer_reviews.text: This product did not include in it's description that it may contain chemicals including LEAD. THIS PRODUCT SHOULD DISPLAY ON IT"S AMAZON PAGE THAT IT HAS A WARNING LABEL. IT"S A bait and switch pure and simple
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Probst

customer_reviews.title: Works for ME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my morning shakes. I love it. Helps Keep your hormones balanced. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just be warned that you might not like the taste.
customer_reviews.text: I add it to a fruit smoothy. At first I wasn't sure if I liked the taste, but now its become hard to swallow and I want to use less and less. Even a half of a teaspoon in a 24oz. smoothy is noticeable. I don't really know how to describe it, it kinda resembles peanut butter except I love peanut butter. Its not a bad product, still a great price and everything else is great. just isn't for everyone. A lot of people don't seem to mind it, it's was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help ease my menopause symptoms. Along with some other dietary changes, my symptoms are a thing of the past! This is the only MACA I've bought for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: V. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is very good and works very well too thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. While I like the lack of dust, the flavor is a little less potent being clean. I still love it and use in my home made kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: jason thomas sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding to shakes!
customer_reviews.text: Love Maca powder and this is really great stuff. So much better to get a big bag to add to shakes instead of a bunch of little expensive pills. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Eldon

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like thick smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great health benefits to maca powder! It makes your smoothie a thicker consistency.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value purchase. Tastes great. Very clean product from what I can tell compared to others I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Short

customer_reviews.title: good.. but does not disolve as easy in juice as other brands
customer_reviews.text: good.. but does not disolve as easy in juice as other brands
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Referred by my nutritionist to use this. I originally ...
customer_reviews.text: Referred by my nutritionist to use this. I originally purchase it at a health food store. This stuff is exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: I prepared it immediately with my tea and it tasted amazing (I'm used to the nutty flavor by now)
customer_reviews.text: Got to me so fast!!! Literally the same day! So thats a plus, I prepared it immediately with my tea and it tasted amazing (I'm used to the nutty flavor by now). If you're skeptical about buying this product and need a sign this is it! Set yourself free from doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Trusty-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as described, the service that delivered the product is excellent. They delivered it at the door of my home and in the time was described by the seller. The product is delicious it mixes with milk easily and do not have strong flavor. I recommend the product to others and the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. O. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Extra energy boost... Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Take this before I work out with my Creatine and BCAA and then after working out with my whey... Been taking it for a month now and feel more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Tastes amazing the quality is excellent. Will purchase again. Beware though this may increase your libido a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice Maca powder to prepare smoothies and drinks. Great nutritious value.
customer_reviews.author: Mariem

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I put this maca powder in my protein drinks/smoothies. It has a great flavor and the bag will probably last me at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: gives me energy and alertness
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is crazy good. I feel more alert and have more energy. Just add tablespoon to your oatmeal with cinnamon and honey until you get used to the flavor. Flavor is little nutty and bitter (differs from person to person), but after 10 meals or so, I really started to like it.
customer_reviews.author: GrayFox

customer_reviews.title: Awsome in a Nutribullet Nutriblast
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor to add in a concoction of fruits (smoothie) for health. Grapes and Maca produce an awesome flavor in a sugarless diet you will really like this flavor blast. Add an Asian Pear to the mix and it becomes my favorite healthy smoothie of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Skip MacKenna

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste is absolutely terrible. Imagine eating farts because that is the aftertaste it will leave in your mouth. I'm not sure how to hide the flavor or smell, but so far so not good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my smoothies. 1 frozen banana, half an avocado, 1/4 cup rice protein powder, 1/4 cup raw cacao powder 1/4 cup goji berries, and 1/8 cup maca blended with 2 cups coconut milk. I started out with 1/4 cup maca, but found when I cut back the amount the drink was less gritty. I think it adds a wonderful flavor and great nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: A. Susan Adam

customer_reviews.title: You can use it almost on anything,and it's healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying it for a while... I'm using it because it says it's good for fertility, ITTC an we'll see how it goes, it doesn't taste bad it's actually pretty good in a milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi C.

customer_reviews.title: Great health benefits
customer_reviews.text: Great health benefits Which can be added to just about anything without altering the taste
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: He thinks this gives him more energy overall and also in the libido department. I have used it also and noticed my skin was softer and smoother, but it also increased my chest area. I also experienced tenderness there and discontinued using it, despite the fact that I had positive improvements in overall feeling of energy and well being. He still uses it and gets nothing but positive reactions. We would recommend it, but you need to judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with my oatmeal almost every morning. Girlfriend and I have noticed an increase in frequency, duration and overall satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: mainedaniel

customer_reviews.title: Decent price.

customer_reviews.title: This product might work out great for some
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this maybe about 15-20 times. Only a quarter tea-spoon at a time. Every time I've taken this, I've felt a warm sensation on my face. The next day, i would see bumps all over my face. Not cysts but small bumps followed by white-heads. I've come to the conclusion that I am having an allergic reaction to this product. This product might work out great for some. Unfortunately, i can't use this.

customer_reviews.title: Taste like death momentarily but I went through menopause two years ...
customer_reviews.text: What I do is mix it in about 5 oz. of water, gulp it down and follow it with a chaser such as juice. Taste like death momentarily but I went through menopause two years ago without virtually any discomfort, only a handful of hot flashes. It was so worth it. It gives me energy too. Just take it like a women.

product_meta.title: Healthworks Maca Powder Raw (32 Ounces / 2 Pounds) | Certified Organic Flour Use | Keto, Vegan & Non-GMO | Premium Peruvian Origin | Breakfast, Smoothies, Baking & Coffee
product_meta.description: Healthworks Raw Organic Unsweetened Maca Powder is grown from a partnership with small farmers right from the source in Peru to ensure the purest and highest quality root powder. Healthworks Maca Powder is certified organic, pure, all-natural, vegan, dairy-free and kosher. Our Maca Root Powder is raw to ensure maximum nutrient absorption. Used as a powerful nutritional staple by the Peruvians for thousands of years, Healthworks Peruvian Maca Powder contains Protein, Fiber, Vitamin C, B Vitamins, Calcium, Iron, Potassium, Copper, Manganese and Fatty Acids. Maca Powder is known to have a strong nutty or malty flavor, which can feel overwhelming at first. Like any new taste, it can take a little time to get comfortable with a new strong flavor. It is important to start out by using ½ teaspoon, and only increasing use if you feel comfortable. Healthworks Maca Powder can be added to your smoothies or juices, which can help soften the taste. The Maca Super Root Powder can also pair well with sweeter fruits to help ease the strong flavor. Great with smoothies/drinks, cereals, yogurt, oatmeal, energy balls, baked goods, cookies, ice-cream, trail mix, granola bars, coffee and snack foods. Healthworks Raw Organic Maca Super Root Powder also goes very well with Healthworks Cacao Powder, Chia Seeds, Cacao Nibs and Goji Berries. Ingredients: Lepidium Meyenii
feature_bullets: PREMIUM RAW, ORGANIC MACA SUPER ROOT POWDER: Healthworks Maca Powder is sustainably grown and harvested in Peru. Also known as Peruvian Ginseng, our Maca Super Root Powder is keto-friendly, vegan, non-GMO, and certified organic. No added preservatives or artificial ingredients.

MANY BENEFITS & NUTRIENTS: A nutrient dense plant-based antioxidant Superfood that is high in Essential Amino Acids, Vegetal Protein, Fiber, Vitamin C, B Vitamins, Calcium, Iron, Potassium, Copper, Manganese and Fatty Acids. Sugar & Cholesterol Free. Maca Super Root powder provides a nice natural energy boost without the crash or jitters found in caffeine.

HEALTHY ALTERNATIVE & COUNTLESS USES: Healthworks Maca Powder/Flour is a perfect addition to smoothies/drinks, juices, cereals, yogurt, oatmeal, baked goods, baking cookies, ice-cream, trail mix, granola bars, soups, coffee and snack foods. Raw, Juicing, Vegan, Paleo, Keto, Clean Eating, Wellness, Active, Biohacking, Life Hacking, Yoga, Spiritual, Blending, Non-GMO, Plant Based.
RICH HISTORY: Revered for many centuries by Inca warriors and a valuable staple in many ancient diets, Healthworks Organic Maca/Macao Powder is a powerful addition to any lifestyle.
OUR MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: 100% Money-Back Satisfaction Guarantee, No Questions Asked! We will offer a 30-day money back guarantee on any product you have purchased from HEALTHWORKS directly.
